Fastcgipp::Request::Messages

Fastcgipp::Request< charT >::Messages Class Reference

Queue type for pending messages. More...

Detailed Description

template<class charT>
class Fastcgipp::Request< charT >::Messages

Queue type for pending messages.

This is merely a derivation of a std::queue<Message> and a boost::mutex that gives data locking abilities to the STL container.
